narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ohiohealth Corporation is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Columbus, OH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $76.9M in Medicaid payments across 1.4M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $76.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
